location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Governor of Bombay that the Resident has granted three sets of bills (No. 8-10) in favour of Aga Mohomed Shoostry; Messres Arrathoon and Arrakeel Constantine; and Messrs Ritchie Stewart & Company, in order to meet the disbursements of the Bushire Residency.
